Math,ToChar.description: Converts an numerical code point to it's mapped character.

Math,FromChar.description: Converts an mapped character to it's numerical code point (in Hex).

List,Range.description: Generate a list of values from a given number range.

While.description: Loops command(s) based on an expression.

ForRange.description: Loops through command(s) based on the value of a counter.

ForEach.description: Enumerates the elements of a list and executes command(s) for each element in the list.

Break.description: Terminate execution of a While/ForEach/ForRange loop.

Continue.description: Continue execution of a While/ForEach/ForRange loop.
